title: Does anyone know the band called No Joy? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’ve heard of No Joy. I heard of them from a friend a couple years ago. When she first mentioned them I more or less shrugged off the suggestion but down the line she played some of theirs songs for me and I really liked them. Beyond that I never dove deeper into their music but that’s something I’ll have to do one of these days.
